description: Organization and animation of an Escape Game on Genetics and Kidney transplantation. The Escape Game has been proposed at the National Science Fair (2019), at the Utopiales event (2019), at the 'Portes Ouvertes' for the Bachelor students of the Nantes University (2019 and 2020), and at the 'Nuit blanche des chercheurs' (2020). An article in the national Ouest France newspaper has been written on this educational activity (2019).
